ComicInfo.Summary:
Orgy of Death: Greedy Dr. Morgan discovers the remnants of a Phoenician cult on a remote island. He’s willing to sacrifice his niece Lela and his pilot Alan to get his hands on the lost treasure of Moloch. But tables are turned when the earth starts to quake and a volcano erupts.
The Man Who Saw Doom: The Hindu mystic Arnar lets John Durrand wear a death-foreseeing magic ring. If John encounters a person with a blank face, that person is going to die in the next minute. The visions drive Durrand almost insane. He passes the ring on to a jeweler.
The Spectre's Face: Mob gunman Barker Crane retires from his killing career and aims for a life of respectability. Whenever Crane has his picture taken, the photograph will reveal a ghostly rotting zombie looming behind him. Crane tries to find the man in the picture, but does not succeed and – demoralized and worn out – turns himself in to the police.
The House Where Horror Lived: John Carlton, “The Bravest Man Alive”, and his man-servant, Drake, spend a night in a haunted house. Drake, however, rigged the place to teach Carlton a lesson in fear. The terror proves to be too stark for Carlton who drops dead from fright.
ComicInfo.Title: Orgy of Death; The Man Who Saw Doom; The Spectre's Face; The House Where Horror Lived
